trends: There has been one other sighting in Sprague
There were no other sightings in Sprague on or around March 21st 2012
Summary: red light very loud jet engine like noise se to nw changed to white long after passing
divs: Sighting Detailsoutside in my front yard I heard a VERY loud jet engine type noise Assuming it was a normal aircraft when I looked in that direction I witnessed a red steady light that was well in front of the sound it went in a straight line southeast to northwest lights went from red to white about 15 degrees past directly overhead lights white and red did not blink added voice note to phone for reference object moved out of peripheral vision planes flew perpendicular to object path less than 45 sec after passing military aircraft fly overhead often in the e to w direction
